metadata.title: KOVO-KUKY | CNC Machining & Custom Manufacturing
metadata.description: Professional CNC machining, turning, milling, and metal cutting. Custom manufacturing from steel, stainless steel, aluminum, and brass.

hero.title: Precision CNC machining
hero.subtitle: Turning, milling, and metal cutting with precision and reliability. We deliver your orders quickly and with top quality.

turning.title: CNC Turning
turning.description: Precision turning on Doosan and Goodway CNC lathes with Fanuc control. We process steel, stainless steel, aluminum, and brass.

milling.title: CNC Milling
milling.description: Milling on modern CNC centers with high precision. Manufacturing parts from drawings or 3D models.

cutting.title: Material Cutting
cutting.description: Precision cutting on Bianco saws. Dividing bar stock and profiles according to customer requirements.

external.title: External Services
external.description: We also provide galvanizing, welding, and other surface treatments through verified partners.

cta.title: Need custom manufacturing?
cta.subtitle: Send us an inquiry with your drawing and we'll prepare a quote for you.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: A reliable partner for CNC machining
about.description: KOVO-KUKY is a Czech company specializing in CNC metal machining. We have a modern machine park and an experienced team that ensures precise manufacturing according to your requirements.

precision.title: Precision
precision.description: We maintain strict tolerances and guarantee the quality of every manufactured part.

reliability.title: Reliability
reliability.description: We meet agreed deadlines and communicate transparently.

flexibility.title: Flexibility
flexibility.description: We handle both single-piece and serial production, from prototypes to large series.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: Modern machines and an experienced team guarantee top-quality workmanship.

machinery.title: Machine Park
machinery.subtitle: Modern CNC machines for precision manufacturing

bianco1.name: Bianco Saw
bianco1.description: Precision cutting of bar stock and profiles.

doosan.name: Doosan Lynx 220
doosan.description: Powerful CNC lathe for precision turning of rotational parts.

goodway200.name: Goodway GLS-200
goodway200.description: Universal CNC lathe for medium and larger diameters.

goodway150.name: Goodway GLS-150
goodway150.description: Compact CNC lathe for smaller parts with high precision.

millingXHS.name: XHS CNC Mill
millingXHS.description: 3-axis milling center for manufacturing precision parts.

robodrill.name: Robodrill CNC Mill
robodrill.description: High-speed milling center for serial production.

gallery.title: Gallery
gallery.subtitle: Examples of our work

contact.subtitle: Get in touch with your project

footer.description: Professional CNC metal machining. Turning, milling, and cutting on modern machines.
